author: veithen
msg: Allow changing the Java class associated with an XML type in maven-wsdl2java-plugin. This feature can be used to enable MTOM in client stubs.

Note that this requires a minor change in the toJava.Emitter, so that the BaseTypeMapping can be overridden (in the previous version of the code it was always reset to the default BaseTypeMapping implementation).
